entry.title: $1995 // Brand New 1Bed in Elevator/Laundry building steps to Park - B,Q Trains
entry.content:
Beautiful Brand New 1 Bedroom in Elevator/Laundry building on beautiful tree lined block steps to Prospect Park B, Q, 2, 5, Trains and the Franklin Av Shuttle
For more info, CALL Txt or Email Benny today! @ 646-963-5926 / Benny@zjamarealty.com

APARTMENT FEATURES:
-1 Large bedroom with closet
-Brand new kitchen with all stainless steel applainces incl Dishwasher!
-Spacious vintage bathroom with soaking tub
-Large living room
-Heat & Hot water included!
-Laundry & Elevator in building

This unit is conveniently located across the street from Prospect Park, & steps to all the best Restaurants, Bars, Cafes, Health food stores, & Parks Prospect Lefferts Gardens has to offer!

For more info, CALL Txt or Email Benny today! @ 646-963-5926 / Benny@zjamarealty.com
